name: Fast and Food
description:
Race in three unique routes and deliver your dish to its destination.

Fast and Food! Racing X Restaurant Simulation!

Collect all needed ingredients with your coolest vechile (I mean, a plate).
Fast and Food! Power up with your income for non-stop driving action!

Attention! Don't ran your plate over customers, garbage, sh*t and anything not tasty.
Play it, and run your own Fast and Food restaurant!
